Package com.uddernetworks.emojide.web

Interface WebCallbackHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicWebCallbackHandler
    public interface WebCallbackHandler

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String generateLink​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> query)
      Generates a raw link referencing a callback name with query parameters.
      java.lang.String generateMdLink​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String name, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> query)
      Generates a link to be placed directly in markdown that references a callback name with query parameters.
      void handleCallback​(java.lang.String url, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> query)
      Invoked by the webserver when a request for a callback is made.

      Registers a callback with the given name and required parameters.
      void registerCommandCallback​(java.lang.String name, CommandCallback commandCallback)
      Registers a callback with the intended use being for commands, as the `channel` id and `member` id are parsed and validated for the callback to be invoked.
      void registerCommandCallback​(java.lang.String name, java.util.List<java.lang.String> requiredParams, CommandCallback commandCallback)
      Registers a callback with the intended use being for commands, as the `channel` id and `member` id are parsed and validated for the callback to be invoked.

    • Method Detail

      • registerCallback

        void registerCallback​(java.lang.String name,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> requiredParams,
                      java.util.function.Consumer<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>> onReceive)
        Registers a callback with the given name and required parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The unique name of the callback
        requiredParams - The query parameters that must be available for the callback to invoke
        onReceive - When a callback is invoked

      • registerCommandCallback

        void registerCommandCallback​(java.lang.String name,
                             CommandCallback commandCallback)
        Registers a callback with the intended use being for commands, as the `channel` id and `member` id are parsed and validated for the callback to be invoked.
        Parameters:
        name - The unique name of the callback
        commandCallback - The callback to be invoked

      • registerCommandCallback

        void registerCommandCallback​(java.lang.String name,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> requiredParams,
                             CommandCallback commandCallback)
        Registers a callback with the intended use being for commands, as the `channel` id and `member` id are parsed and validated for the callback to be invoked. This allows for other required parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The unique name of the callback
        requiredParams - Extra required parameters for the callback
        commandCallback - The callback to be invoked

      • generateMdLink

        java.lang.String generateMdLink​(java.lang.String text,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> query)
        Generates a link to be placed directly in markdown that references a callback name with query parameters.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to display in the link
        name - The name of the callback
        query - The query parameters of the link
        Returns:
        The markdown of the link

      • generateLink

        java.lang.String generateLink​(java.lang.String name,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> query)
        Generates a raw link referencing a callback name with query parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the callback
        query - The query parameters of the callback
        Returns:
        The raw link

      • handleCallback

        void handleCallback​(java.lang.String url,
                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> query)
        Invoked by the webserver when a request for a callback is made. This parses and finds appropriate listeners with the correct query parameters.
        Parameters:
        url - The ending URL without the prefix, e.g. if http://localhost:6969/z/info?one=two is requested, this parameter will be info?one=two
        query - The query parameters of the request
